parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language of the response. Valid values: zh-CN and en-US. Default value: zh-CN. The value zh-CN indicates Chinese, and the value en-US indicates English.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The microservice namespace to which the application belongs.

parameters.name: PageIndex
parameters.description: The start page of the returned pages. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 6.

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.description: This parameter is used for exact match of circuit breaking rules.

parameters.name: ResourceSearchKey
parameters.description: This parameter is used for fuzzy match of circuit breaking rules.
